entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: The Yule Ball is a social event where students are dressed up and enjoying themselves. (Excerpt: 'THE  YULE  BALL')

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student who is attending the Yule Ball with Parvati. (Excerpt: 'Harry concentrated on not tripping over his feet.')

entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: Parvati Patil is a student who is attending the Yule Ball with Harry. (Excerpt: 'Parvati seemed to be enjoying herself; she was beaming around at everybody, steering Harry so forcefully that he felt as though he were a show dog she was putting through its paces.')

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student who is watching Hermione pass by with narrowed eyes. (Excerpt: 'H e  c a u g h t  s i g h t  o f  R o n  a n d Padma as he neared the top table, but Ron was watching Hermione pass with narrowed eyes.')

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a student who is being watched by Ron and Karkaroff. (Excerpt: 'Ron was watching Hermione pass with narrowed eyes.')

entities.name: padma patil
entities.description: Padma Patil is a student who is looking sulky. (Excerpt: 'Padma was looking sulky.')

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who is smiling happily at the champions approaching the top table. (Excerpt: 'Dumbledore smiled happily as the champions approached the top table, but Karkaroff wore an expression remarkably like Ron’s as he watched Krum and Hermione draw nearer.')

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a wizard who is watching Krum and Hermione with an expression similar to Ron's. (Excerpt: 'Dumbledore smiled happily as the champions approached the top table, but Karkaroff wore an expression remarkably like Ron’s as he watched Krum and Hermione draw nearer.')

entities.name: kruhm
entities.description: Krum is a wizard who is being watched by Karkaroff. (Excerpt: 'Dumbledore smiled happily as the champions approached the top table, but Karkaroff wore an expression remarkably like Ron’s as he watched Krum and Hermione draw nearer.')

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is a wizard who is wearing bright purple robes with large yellow stars. (Excerpt: 'Ludo Bagman, tonight in robes of bright purple with large yellow stars, was clap-')
